attributes.action: Ban the monster raving looney party they are not a serious party
attributes.background: Ban the monster raving looney party they are not a serious party and they just help split the vote for serious parties In elections and are nothing more than an embarrassment in British politics

rejection.details:
The Electoral Commission is responsible for registering political parties. The Electoral Commission is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can find out more here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/who-we-are-and-what-we-do/register-or-maintain-a-political-party
